content: e behind the fpdtr * repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 2 half_double_crochet 4 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 1 single_crochet per side round 5 color a in this round we ll be working in both round 3 and 4 start in any fpdtr from round 3 *1 puff in the next st chain 2 skip the first 2 sts from round 4 i e half_double_crochet double_crochet bphdc round next 2 sts bpsc bphdc round next 2 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts* repeat 3 more times close with a slip_stitch in top of the 1e puff don t cut yarn 1 puff 2ch2-sps 4 bphdc 1 bpsc round 6 color a slip_stitch in the next ch2-space * 1 double_crochet chain 1 x 3 skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 x 3 1 fptr chain 2 1 fptr round puff chain 1* repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 6 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 8 ch1-sps 2 fptr 1 ch2-space round 7 color a start in any ch2-space * 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in ch2-space fphdc half_double_crochet x 8 fphdc* repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 12 half_double_crochet 1 ch1-space 9 fphdc per side round 8 color b start in any ch1-space *2 single_crochet in chain-space bpsc round the next 21 sts* repeat 3 more times fo with inv join 2 single_crochet 21 bpsc per side thanks for making my alice flower square i hope you enjoyed it i would love to see your progress and finished squares so feel free to post them on instagram and ravelry please tag me @mycroshed and use #aliceflowersquare for me to be able to see your pictures if you have any questions about the pattern or stiches you can always send me a dm on instagram i m happy to help this is a my cro-shed design and for personal use only it can not be sold copied translated shared or edited in any way without my permission if you want to share it you can link to it you can sell finished products but you can not use my pictures to promote them please always credit me as the designer ©mycroshed 2022
